mapper.insert: insert into PLAYER(player_no, game, score, playerName, assist, attackPoint, shoot, shootOnTarget, foul, yellowCard, redCard, offSide, teamName, playerImage, leagueName, rank, season) values((select nvl(max(player_no),0)+1 as player_no from PLAYER), #{game}, #{score}, #{playerName}, #{assist}, #{attackPoint}, #{shoot}, #{shootOnTarget}, #{foul}, #{yellowCard}, #{redCard}, #{offSide}, #{teamName}, #{playerImage}, #{p_leagueName},#{rank}, #{p_season})
mapper.delete: delete from PLAYER where season = #{p_season} AND leagueName = #{p_leagueName}
